name: Red Faction: Armageddon - Path to War
name_original: Red Faction: Armageddon - Path to War
description: Path to War is downloadable content (DLC) for Red Faction: Armageddon. It is playable during four single-player missions separate from the main plot. The antagonist of the main game, Adam Hale, seeking ultimate revenge against the Red Faction, plans to destroy the Terraformer, the one thing that keeps the surface of Mars habitable for thousands of colonists. Four new missions feature Mallus, Hale's right hand, and Darius Mason, protagonist of the base game, as well as aerial flyers, orbital strikes, and the Red Faction armored surface tank. Two destructive new weapons, the Sharpshooter Gun and Shard Cannon, will be unlocked, and ten new achievements may be earned.
